title: All-solution-processed inorganic CsPbBr3 solar cells and their bifacial-irradiation functions
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00845F, Paper
Hiroaki Daiguji, Hiroto Takano, Ibuki Watanabe, Rin Ando, Manabu Ishizaki, Masato Kurihara
Solution-processed technologies for (semi)transparent top electrodes remain suboptimal, although see-through perovskite solar cells (s-PSCs) are required in realizing window-integrated photovoltaics. Herein, we choose an inorganic perovskite, CsPbBr3, offering the best...
